scripts.init: concurrently "npm install" "cd play-server && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install" "cd play-client && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install" "cd script-server && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install"  "cd script-client && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd mqtt && npm run start" "cd play-server && npm run backend" "cd play && npm run start" "cd script_database && npm run start"  "cd script_editor && npm run start"
